content: Highest post in the judicial system of SingaporeThis article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "Chief Justice of Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(December 2013)* The **chief justice of Singapore** is the [presiding member](/wiki/Chief_justice) of the [Supreme Court of Singapore](/wiki/Supreme_Court_of_Singapore). It is the highest office in the [judicial system of Singapore](/wiki/Judicial_system_of_Singapore), appointed by the [president](/wiki/President_of_Singapore), on the advice of the [prime minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore). The incumbent chief justice is [Sundaresh Menon](/wiki/Sundaresh_Menon), who took office on 6 November 2012. He was the first chief justice to be born in Singapore. ## History Prior to 1959, the chief justice was appointed by the [governor of Singapore](/wiki/List_of_governors_of_Singapore), when Singapore was still a [Crown colony](/wiki/Crown_colony) part of the [British Empire](/wiki/British_Empire). ## List of chief justices (1965–present) ### Chief justices of the Republic of Singapore #PortraitChief Justice of the Republic of SingaporeTook officeLeft office1[Wee Chong Jin](/wiki/Wee_Chong_Jin)9 August 196527 September 19902[Yong Pung How](/wiki/Yong_Pung_How)28 September 199010 April 20063[Chan Sek Keong](/wiki/Chan_Sek_Keong)11 April 20065 November 20124[Sundaresh Menon](/wiki/Sundaresh_Menon)6 November 2012*Incumbent* ## List of chief justices (1867–1965) ### Chief justices of the Straits Settlements #Chief Justice of the Straits SettlementsTook officeLeft office1Sir [Peter Benson Maxwell](/wiki/Peter_Benson_Maxwell)186718712Sir [Thomas Sidgreaves](/wiki/Thomas_Sidgreaves)187118863Sir [Theodore Thomas Ford](/wiki/Theodore_Ford)188618904Sir [Edward Loughlin O'Malley](/wiki/Edward_Loughlin_O%27Malley)189018925Sir [Elliot Bovill](/wiki/Elliot_Bovill)189218936Sir [John Winfield Bonser](/wiki/John_Winfield_Bonser)189318937Sir [W.
